User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user (Firebase Auth UID).

Vote.title: Vote
Vote.description: Represents a single vote cast by a user for a specific option.

userId.description: The UID of the user who cast the vote.

optionId.description: The ID of the voting option selected.

timestamp.description: The server timestamp when the vote was cast.

userEmail.description: Denormalized user email for easier display.

/votes/{voteId}.description: Stores all votes. The document ID is the user's UID to enforce one vote per user.
